投.definition: to throw (sth in a specific direction: ball, javelin, grenade etc); to cast (a ballot); to cast (a glance, a shadow etc); to put in (money for investment, a coin to operate a slot machine); to send (a letter, a manuscript etc); to throw oneself into (a river, a well etc to commit suicide); to go to; to seek refuge; to place oneself into the hands of; (coll.) to rinse (clothes) in water

投中.definition: to hit the target with one's throw; (basketball) to score

投井下石.definition: to throw stones at sb who has fallen down a well (idiom); to hit a person when he's down

投保.definition: to take out insurance; to insure

投入.definition: to throw into; to put into; to throw oneself into; to participate in; to invest in; absorbed; engrossed

投其所好.definition: to adapt to sb's taste; to fit sb's fancy

投合.definition: to go well together; to be compatible; to cater to; to please

投壺.definition: ancient banquet game of throwing arrows into a pot, the winner determined by the number of arrows thrown in, and the loser required to drink as punishment

投契.definition: to get along well (with sb); congenial; to speculate (on financial markets)

投奔.definition: to seek shelter; to seek asylum

投宿.definition: to lodge; to stay (for the night)

投屏.definition: (computing) to mirror one's screen (to another device); screen sharing; screen mirroring

投師.definition: to join a guru for instruction

投彈.definition: to throw an explosive charge; to bomb

投影幾何.definition: projective geometry; same as 射影幾何|射影几何

投影幾何學.definition: projective geometry; same as 射影幾何學|射影几何学

投懷送抱.definition: to throw oneself in sb's arms; to throw oneself at sb

投拍.definition: to start shooting (a film); to invest in (a movie); to put (sth) up for auction

投擲.definition: to throw sth a long distance; to hurl; to throw at; to throw (dice etc); to flip (a coin)

投放.definition: to input; to throw in; to unload; to put into circulation

投放市場.definition: to put sth on the market

投敵.definition: to go over to the enemy; to defect

投映.definition: (of a light source) to cast one's light on; to project (an image)

投書.definition: to submit a written piece (letter, article, opinion piece etc)

投桃報李.definition: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor; to exchange gifts; Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.

投案.definition: to surrender to the authorities; to turn oneself in (for a crime)

投標.definition: to bid; to make a tender

投機.definition: congenial; agreeable; to speculate; to profiteer

投機倒把.definition: to engage in speculation and profiteering

投機取巧.definition: to gain advantage by any means, fair or foul; to be opportunistic; to be full of tricks

投注.definition: to throw one's energies (into an activity); to invest one's emotions (in sth); to bet; betting

投環.definition: variant of 投繯|投缳[tou2 huan2]

投生.definition: reborn (of departed spirit); to be reincarnated; to leave home for a new life

投產.definition: to put into production; to put into operation

投石問路.definition: lit. to toss a stone to find out what's ahead (idiom); fig. to test the waters

投票率.definition: proportion of vote; turnout in election

投稿.definition: to submit articles for publication; to contribute (writing)

投筆從戎.definition: to lay down the pen and take up the sword (idiom); to join the military (esp. of educated person)

投緣.definition: to be kindred spirits; to hit it off

投繯.definition: to hang oneself; to commit suicide by hanging

投考.definition: to sign up for an examination; to apply for admission (to a university etc); to apply (for a position)

投袂而起.definition: lit. to shake one's sleeves and rise (idiom); fig. to get excited and move to action

投訴.definition: complaint; to complain; to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)

投誠.definition: to defect; to surrender; to capitulate

投資報酬率.definition: return on investment; rate of return

投軍.definition: to join up; to enlist (e.g. in the military)

投錯胎.definition: to be reincarnated in the wrong womb; (fig.) to be born into unfortunate circumstances (impoverished family, domestic violence etc)

投靠.definition: to rely on help from sb

投鞭斷流.definition: arms enough to stem the stream (idiom); formidable army

投鼠忌器.definition: lit. to refrain from shooting at the rat for fear of breaking the vases (idiom); to not act against an evil so as to prevent harm to innocents
